snippet: Stocks built on gains from late last week. Shares of ADT were surging after it agreed to be bought by an investment company.
abstract: Wall Street stocks close higher for second day in row.
lead_paragraph: Stocks built on gains from late last week. Shares of ADT were surging after it agreed to be bought by an investment company.

headline.main: After Long Weekend, Market Extends a Winning Streak
headline.print_headline: After Long Weekend, Market Extends Winning Streak
